sources.full: Isle of The Mutant Beasts - Items and Weapons

item.name: Summer Breeze
entries: When you wield this sword you deal 1d4 extra fire damage. You have a +1 modifier to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. While holding this sword you can cast the spell {@spell produce flame} using Charisma as spellcasting ability. On the hilt of the blade is engraved a Jawless Skull and the name is carved on the blade. This is a blade forged by the Ravenshade family and was gifted to Raul Ravenshade. This blade has a twin named 'Autumn Breath'.

item.name: Autumn Breath
entries: When you wield this sword you deal 1d4 extra cold damage. You have a +1 modifier to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. On the hilt of the blade is engraved a Jawless Skull and the name is carved on the blade. This is a blade forged by the Ravenshade family and was gifted to Gilda Ravenshade. This blade has a twin named 'Summer Breeze'.
